text: ninakkeararivumillatta vallatineyum enre pankaliyakkan avariruvarum ninne nirbandhikkukayanenkil akkaryattil avare ni anusarikkarut. ennalum ihaleakatt avareatu nalla nilayil sahavasikkuka. ennilekku pascattapiccu matanniyavanre pata pintutaruka. avasanam ninnaluteyeakke matakkam ennilekku tanneyan. appeal ninnal ceytukeantirunnatinepparri ninnale vivaramariyikkum
